id.description: Unique identifier for this list membership

list_id.description: ID of the list to which the prospect is a member of

prospect_id.description: Unique identifier of the prospect associated with this list membership

opted_out.description: Indicates whether the prospect has opted out of this list membership

created_at.description: Date and time when this list membership was created

updated_at.description: Date and time when this list membership was last updated
